description: (English version) 2024.12.17, add the overall resource overview! Support Grafana6&7,Support Node Exporter v0.16 and above.Optimize the main metrics display. Includes: CPU, memory, disk IO, network, temperature and other monitoring metrics„ÄÇhttps://github.com/starsliao/Prometheus

panels.description:
Partition usage, disk read, disk write, download bandwidth, upload bandwidth. If there are multiple network cards or partitions, the values are collected from the network card or partition with the highest usage rate.

Connections: CurrEstab - Number of TCP connections currently in ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT state.

Health score is a new metric calculated based on CPU, memory, and IO. A score below 90 indicates that system resource usage needs attention. This is a metric under testing, and parameters may need to be optimized based on actual conditions.
panels.title: Server Resource Overview Table [Total Hosts: $total]
Overall Total Load and Overall Average CPU Usage
Total Memory and Overall Average Memory Usage
Total Disk and Average Disk Usage

panels.description:
In this dashboard: Total disk space, Used space, Available space, Usage percentage are consistent with the Size, Used, Avail, Use% columns of the df command, and the Use% value will be rounded to one decimal place for better accuracy.

Note: The Use% algorithm in df is: (size - free) * 100 / (avail + (size - free)), if the result is divisible, it will be that value, if not divisible, it will be that value+1, the unit of the result is %.
Reference df command source code:
panels.title: [$show_name]: Partition Available Space (EXT.*/XFS/NFS)

panels.description:
Read time seconds: The number of seconds spent on read operations for each disk partition

Write time seconds: The number of seconds spent on write operations for each disk partition

IO time seconds: The number of seconds spent on input/output operations for each disk partition

IO time weighted seconds: The weighted number of seconds spent on input/output operations for each disk partition
panels.title: I/O Read/Write Latency (Reference: <100ms)

panels.description:
Reads completed: Number of read completions per second for each disk partition

Writes completed: Number of write completions per second for each disk partition

IO now: Number of input/output requests being processed per second for each disk partition
panels.title: Disk Read/Write Rate (IOPS)

panels.description:
Read bytes: Number of bytes read per second for each disk partition
Written bytes: Number of bytes written per second for each disk partition
panels.title: Disk Read/Write Capacity per Second

panels.description:
The time spent on I/O in natural time per second. (wall-clock time)

node_disk_io_time_seconds_total:
The number of seconds spent by the disk on input/output operations. This is a cumulative value. (Milliseconds Spent Doing I/Os)

irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total[1m]):
Calculates the rate per second: (last value - previous last value)/timestamp difference, i.e., the proportion of time spent by the disk on I/O operations in 1 second.

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

panels.title: I/O Operation Time Percentage per Second (I/O Util)

panels.description:
Sockets_used - Total amount of all protocol sockets in use

CurrEstab - Number of TCP connections currently in ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT state

TCP_alloc - Number of allocated TCP sockets (established, with sk_buff allocated)

TCP_tw - Number of TCP connections waiting to close

UDP_inuse - Number of UDP sockets in use

RetransSegs - Number of TCP retransmitted segments

OutSegs - Number of TCP segments sent

InSegs - Number of TCP segments received

properties.value: Total number of all protocol sockets used

panels.title: Network Socket Connection Information

title: Node Exporter Dashboard 20241217 Universal Single Version
